title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 178: Featuring Ken Daniels
description:
On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by the voice of the Detroit Red Wings, Ken Daniels. Ken joins to talk about his long broadcasting career and all the crazy stories along the way. The guys also wrap up the Western Conference Finals and talk some Sharks as they are saving their Bruins-Blues preview for the next podcast. The boys discuss Cindy, Zdeno Chara, and Whit wraps up with a great Memorial Day tribute.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
